column5: I often see folks here and on other sites asking about outpost and fly in fishing trips I have started posting some posts on my blog on how we got into it, gear we needed and so forth If you are interested there are probably a few posts that may be helpful and over time I hope to add a bunch more Just posted my Top 5 picks of gear needed focusing on whats out there for Black Friday deals www.northernjacks.com Cheers Andrew
